ygData.subject: Happy Birthday Neo Beast wars RPG!
ygData.msgSnippet: If you dont know, today is our one year anniversary. This day, in 1999, we began the epic story of the Neo Beasts Wars. Over time we have lost members,

Subject: Happy Birthday Neo Beast wars RPG!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: JP3884@...

    If you dont know, today is our one year anniversary. This day, in 1999, 
we began the epic story of the Neo Beasts Wars. Over time we have lost 
members, banished members, and gained members. Lets hope that this RPG will 
continue onward and get even more successful. As for the standout players, we 
will be giving out awards in the near future when we get around to analyze 
some posts. In the meantime, keep up the RPing!
-JP
